user.title: Select Connection Method
user.description: Choose how you want to connect to your Frameo device.

Network.title: Configure Network Connection
Network.description: Enter the IP Address of your Frameo. Wireless ADB must be enabled on the device first.

USB.title: Configure USB Connection
USB.description: Enter the serial number for your USB-connected Frameo device. See the integration documentation for help finding the serial number.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please check your settings, ensure ADB is enabled and the serial/host is correct.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Check the Home Assistant logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Frameo device is already configured.
